name: Asteroids.v2
body:
### Welcome to Asteroids.v2 Page 
This Game is the easiest way to create beautiful Games and get an idea about Javascript Drawing . Reading the code ,understanding the code ,then applying what you learnt on the idea of the game you want to build . 2DGames preferable .
```
Linux Users
$ wget http://b2l2l.com/Asteroids.v2/Asteroids.zip
$ unzip Asteroids.zip
```

### Authors and Contributors
author: (@onishiweb), Edited  (@b2l2l) with love of github . 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with asteroids code? ? Contact me at https://b2l2l.com or b@b2l2l.com and iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
